entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:57 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 2:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
